articles.content: Before Donald Trump took office, Independence Day festivities cost the federal government roughly $6.5 million a year. By 2019, the cost was all the way up to $13 million, and Trump managed to top th… [+4 chars]

articles.title: Climate change is NOT to blame for birds shrinking in size, scientists say - Daily Mail
articles.description: North American migratory birds are changing in size and shape independently of changes in their migration timing, report University of Michigan scientists.
articles.content:
Climate change is not to blame for North American migratory birds shrinking in size, a new study claims.
